title: Jedi Knight

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Check to see if someone is a Sith.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit a Sith, you will attack them.
- First town you visit will be your apprentice, and will change their role accordingly (Post 614.5).
- If you are visited by a Sith, they will be attacked. If they are a Sith Commanding role, you will die as well.
- Once all Sith are dead, You will either become a Vigilante (Post 67) with 5 bullets or your original town role if you were taken in by another Jedi Knight.
- Guaranteed if a member of the Sith faction is rolled

desc:
Post 614
*"For over a thousand generations, the Jedi Knights were the guardians of peace and justice in the Old Republic."*
